title: Homemade Chinese chicken noodle soup
ingredients: ['60g rice vermicelli noodles', '1.25 litres chicken stock', '1 large clove garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons grated fresh ginger', '4 ( 5cm) pieces fresh lemongrass stems, minced', '2 skinless, boneless chicken breast, cut into strips', '6 large prawns, peeled and deveined', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '2 tablespoons fish sauce', '1 jalapeno chilli pepper, cut into 8 thin slices', '1 tablespoon freshly chopped coriander']
